test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove()`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove(1, 2, "wrong param")`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(remove((1, 2, 3), 0)) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(remove((1, 2, 3), -4)) eq 3`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `empty(remove((), 4))`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove(("one", 2, 3), 1) instance of xs:integer+`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove((1, "two", 3), 2) instance of xs:integer+`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove((1, 2, "three"), 3) instance of xs:integer+`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(remove(("one", 2, 3), 1)) eq 2`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(remove((1, "two", 3), 2)) eq 2`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `count(remove((1, 2, "three"), 3)) eq 2`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-12
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove((3.1, "four"), 1)`.

test-case.name: K-SeqRemoveFunc-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `remove(error(), 1)`.
